subject: Supplementary agreement for 100% change of shareholding & refinancing in respect of PPP Projects-reg.
text: HRaly <5ty rTHPf qiferasrot (43w 4Rdev # RTTHPf HTTT4, HRT FRTR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 774 T4r vfl-5 &a 6, d4er-10, ERWT, 7$ @ovlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TH/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ PPP/ 2023 Policy Circular No.8.4.38/ 2023 dated 13th February, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/BOT /SUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT /2022 (Comp. No. 184125)} Sub.: Supplementary agreement for 100% change of shareholding & refinancing in respect of PPP Projects- reg: With reference to the above subject and based the direction of Executive Committee in its 539th (Agenda Item No.539.05) & 540th (Agenda Item No.540.05) meeting held on 08.12.2022 & 15.12.2022 respectively. 2_ It is hereby clarified that upon 100% equity Divestment, the outgoing promoter shall not have residual rights over the accrued claims, and the same shall vest with new promoter_ further to verify all the works in scope are completed, & outstanding issues (like vigilance compliance, maintenance issues etc. pending will be taken up by the transferee entity. In future all cases of share transfer/ refinancing, status of pending works/ punchlist items should also be submitted. Therefore, a Supplementary agreement (Annexure-I) shall be signed with the concessionaire by respective Technical division. 3_ Further to above, it is also clarified that in case of any refinancing proposal also a Supplementary agreement (Annexure-Il) shall be signed with concessionaire by respective technical division 4 Further Technical division shall also execute a Supplementary agreement for 100% share transfer & refinancing proposal in all earlier approved cases 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
